member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_CAPS
member.summary: Specifies capabilities of the video decoder.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_CAPS_DOWNSAMPLE
member.summary: Indicates that the graphics driver supports at least a subset of downsampling operations.

summary.para: Indicates that the decoding hardware cannot support the decode operation in real-time. Decoding is still supported for transcoding scenarios.
With this capability, it is possible that decoding can occur in real-time if downsampling is enabled.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_CAPS.D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_CAPS_DOWNSAMPLE_DYNAMIC
